statements: SELECT * FROM supplier_contacts;
SELECT supplier_name, contact_email FROM supplier_contacts WHERE supplier_id = 1;
SELECT contact_name FROM supplier_contacts WHERE supplier_name = 'ABC Suppliers';
SELECT * FROM supplier_contacts WHERE contact_email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT supplier_name, contact_phone FROM supplier_contacts ORDER BY supplier_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM supplier_contacts ORDER BY supplier_id DESC;
SELECT supplier_name, count(*) as contact_count FROM supplier_contacts GROUP BY supplier_name HAVING count(*) > 1;
SELECT supplier_name, contact_name, contact_email FROM supplier_contacts WHERE supplier_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT supplier_name, contact_phone FROM supplier_contacts WHERE contact_phone IS NOT NULL ORDER BY supplier_name ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT supplier_name FROM supplier_contacts ORDER BY supplier_name ASC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM supplier_contacts;
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_email FROM supplier_contacts ORDER BY supplier_name DESC;
SELECT supplier_id, supplier_email FROM supplier_contacts WHERE supplier_id = 3;
SELECT material_name, order_date, quantity FROM order_tracking WHERE order_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT supplier_id, supplier_name, supplier_phone FROM supplier_contacts WHERE supplier_id BETWEEN 1 AND 5 ORDER BY supplier_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM supplier_contacts WHERE supplier_id = 1;
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_email FROM supplier_contacts WHERE supplier_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_email, supplier_phone FROM supplier_contacts WHERE supplier_email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT * FROM order_tracking WHERE order_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT material_name, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM order_tracking GROUP BY material_name;

SELECT supplier_id, supplier_name, contact_name FROM supplier_contacts;
SELECT contact_email, contact_phone, supplier_name FROM supplier_contacts;
SELECT * FROM textiles WHERE supplier_id = 1;
SELECT textile_name, textile_type, supplier_id FROM textiles;

SELECT contact_name, contact_email FROM supplier_contacts WHERE contact_phone LIKE '%123%';
SELECT supplier_id, supplier_name, textile_name FROM supplier_contacts JOIN textiles ON supplier_contacts.supplier_id = textiles.supplier_id;
SELECT order_id, order_date, quantity FROM orders WHERE total_price > 1000;

SELECT supplier_name, textile_name, quantity, total_price FROM supplier_contacts JOIN textiles ON supplier_contacts.supplier_id = textiles.supplier_id JOIN orders ON orders.textile_id = textiles.textile_id WHERE order_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';

SELECT order_id, order_date, material_type, quantity FROM order_tracking WHERE supplier_id = 2 AND quantity > 100;
SELECT material_name, quantity_available FROM material_inventory WHERE quantity_available < 50 ORDER BY material_name ASC;
SELECT category_name FROM material_categories WHERE category_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM Suppliers ORDER BY supplier_name ASC;
SELECT supplier_name, contact_phone FROM Suppliers WHERE contact_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT customer_name, contact_phone FROM Customers WHERE contact_phone LIKE '%555%';
SELECT order_id, order_date FROM Orders WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT material_name, material_type FROM Materials WHERE supplier_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM Suppliers;
SELECT supplier_name, contact_name, contact_phone FROM Suppliers ORDER BY supplier_name DESC;
SELECT supplier_name, material_name, material_type FROM Suppliers INNER JOIN Materials ON Suppliers.supplier_id = Materials.supplier_id;
SELECT customer_name, contact_phone FROM Customers WHERE contact_name LIKE '%John%';
SELECT o.order_id, od.material_id, od.quantity, od.unit_price FROM Orders o JOIN Order_Details od ON o.order_id = od.order_id ORDER BY od.quantity DESC;
